message: Let's start fair. I'm willing to give you a good chunk of the money, but I'm confident we can negotiate a better deal for both of us later on.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more considering the risk I'm taking.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think we can both do better than your last offer. Let's work together to find a solution that benefits us both.
I'm not giving up yet. I think I can get a better deal if I wait. You're not getting all the money without a fight.
I think we're both being too stubborn.  Let's split the money evenly and avoid the risk of getting nothing at all.  It's a fair deal, and we can both walk away happy.
